BadRequestExceptionResponse.description: Invalid input values. Ex bad marketplaceId, missing required inputs, or requester does not have permission for API and/or resource.

identifier.description: Identifier for requested store. Currently supported: store's brand-/sub-entityId and storeId.

maxResults.description: Optional: Max number of entries returned in a call. Supported values are 1-30 inclusive. Defaults to 30.

nextToken.description: Optional: Pagination input token. If provided, returns the next paginated result of size <= `maxResults`.
Optional: Pagination input token. If provided, returns the next paginated result of size <= `maxResults`.

storePages.description: Paginated list of `StorePageInfos`'s. Result list size <= maxResults.

identifier.description: Optional: Identifier for requested entity. Currently supported: Advertiser entityId.

maxResults.description: Optional: Max number of entries returned in a call. Supported values are 1-30 inclusive. Defaults to 30.

nextToken.description: Optional: Pagination input token. If provided, returns the next paginated result of size <= `maxResults`.
Nullable. The next token to be used for paginated querying.

stores.description: Paginated list of `StoreInfo`'s. Result list size <= maxResults. If advertiser has no stores, returns empty list.

brandEntityId.description: The ID of the Brand Entity associated with the store

storePageId.description: The ID of the store page

storePageName.description: The name of the store page

storePageUrl.description: The URL of the store page

post.description:
List all Store pages for Advertiser

**Authorized resource type**:
DSP Rodeo Entity ID, DSP Advertiser Account ID

**Parameter name**:
Amazon-Advertising-AccountId

**Parameter in**:
header

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit","advertiser_campaign_view","amazon_stores_edit","amazon_stores_view"]

**Authorized resource type**:
Global Ad Account ID, Profile ID

**Parameter name**:
Amazon-Advertising-GlobalAccountId

**Parameter in**:
header

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit","advertiser_campaign_view","amazon_stores_edit","amazon_stores_view"]
